evidence.text:
Person A: Jasper better watch his ass with this Craig guy. Several assault charges, possession...
Person B: Look, we just heard - Jasper can't go in. Chief officially suspended him for those teenagers he jacked up.
Person A: Clock's ticking - and you need to get Jasper's wire.
Person B: And you might want to check this out real quick. It's everything we know so far, Billy.

Person A: Oh, shit! Look at Gary.
Person B: The man is a natural.
Person A: Playing some offense here.
Person B: Okay, Daniel Day! Nailed that fucker.
Person B: Hey Gary, does your family really have land out on the bayou?
Person A: Well, great work, Gary.

Person A: Can we turn up the air, Phil?
Person B: Yeah, man...

Person B: I don't think so, but it's hard to tell with Gary.
Person B: I mean, it's safe to say we got our new hitman, at least till Jasper comes back.
Person A: So, you're a fuckin' life coach now?!
Person B: Is what I just saw and listened to what I saw and listened to? I'm not believing it.
Person B: And did you notice how cute she was? I wonder if that had ANYTHING to do with it?

Person A: I'd rip my I.U.D. out for Ron. I wouldn't share a straw with Gary.
Person B: Gary is hung like a straw, but Ron, strictly nightstick.

Person A: I mean, it's kind of sounding like you would fuck Ron, too.
Person B: I would take your sloppy seconds, if it were Ron.
Person B: It's going to be fine, Gary - you could do this in your sleep. Just another pussy too scared to do it himself.
Person B: The one you were Ron.

Person A: She's either the best liar we've ever encountered...or she's innocent.
Person A: Yeah, me too.
